synopsis.text:
Sensing an odd disturbance, Kakashi Hatake separates from his Team 7, comprised of Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, and Sakura Haruno, during their search for a missing individual. Kakashi soon finds himself ensnared by a mysterious trap, while the rest of the team is ambushed by enigmatic ninjas. Sakura is swiftly captured, leaving Naruto and Sasuke no choice but to collaborate in order to save her and complete their mission.

Meanwhile, Kakashi struggles to free himself and assist the person they were initially seeking. This thrilling adventure is a special, original anime episode, celebrating the 10th anniversary of Naruto's serialization start. Set in the time when Team Kakashi was still intact, this full CG mission offers a fresh perspective on the beloved series, revealing a previously unseen story from their youth. Don't miss this unique and exciting journey with Team Kakashi!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
